posts.post_content:
I was just able to upgrade some of my T205s and would like to see if there is any interest to buy or trade?  For sale, I'm looking to get $1300 (paypal gift, mo or check) for the lot. 

For trade, I'm interested in the following:
T206 Cobb
T205 Drum or Hindu
T205 Dolly Gray "stats" - Good or better


Below T205s are priced individually:

1. Wallace - w/o cap - one line - SGC 20:  $700 (rare variation)
2. Hoblitzell - name correct, no Cin - SGC 20: $200 (hard to find variation)
3. Jimmy Collins - SGC 10 - $85.00
4. Marquard - Piedmont factory #42 - SGC 10: $50  
5. [STRIKE]Ford white cap - SGC 10 - SOLD[/STRIKE]
6. Griffith - HLC -  SGC 10 - $40
7. Bell - SGC 10 - $18.50
8. [STRIKE]Ewing - SCG A - SOLD[/STRIKE]
9. [STRIKE]Sheckard - SGC A - SOLD[/STRIKE]
10. Chance - SGC 10 - $40
11. Clarke - SGC 10 - $35
12. Johnson - SGC 10 - $250

I will certainly entertain other reasonable offers and or trades and provide pictures if requested.

r/
Frank
